name: GD3
description:
_________________________________________

Control a small sphere using your device's built in tilt-detection, and  face trials and obstacles in an effort to obtain transport back to their home world!

_________________________________________

Roll to the end!

• Control the ball by tilting your device

• Get the best time

• Power ups along the way

• Avoid obstacles

_________________________________________

Balls-it-Up is a challenging level-based game.

-  Guide your ball through the different themed levels, which range from forest-based, to cave-based, to moon-based and beyond.

-  Begin from the starting point to roll down through hand-made tracks, and jump over and around obstacles, and retry levels at higher difficulty levels to challenge yourself.

-  Use the different power ups to outsmart the designs of the levels.

-  Be careful to not fall off of the track  -  If the ball falls off the track, it will respawn at the last checkpoint that was reached, but you may lose your progress.

Master the controls and become the best!
